channel.title: Melon's House Party
channel.description: Welcome to Melon’s House Party! Did you know that the objects in your house sing and speak all day long? They just do so in a key only dogs can hear. Enter, Melon, an eight pound dog with a thousand pound heart who is the key to a world that lives right under our noses! She lives in a world full of friends; an always singing record player, a soulless computer, her bookshelf therapist and many more. But her best friend in the world is Couch. No musical adventure is too big for Melon and Couch as long as they can figure out a way to do it together. As Melon learns about herself and the world around her, she shows us how to appreciate the little things in life and the importance of friendship and family.
channel.itunes:author: Wondery
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to Melon’s House Party! Did you know that the objects in your house sing and speak all day long? They just do so in a key only dogs can hear. Enter, Melon, an eight pound dog with a thousand pound heart who is the key to a world that lives right under our noses! She lives in a world full of friends; an always singing record player, a soulless computer, her bookshelf therapist and many more. But her best friend in the world is Couch. No musical adventure is too big for Melon and Couch as long as they can figure out a way to do it together. As Melon learns about herself and the world around her, she shows us how to appreciate the little things in life and the importance of friendship and family.

item.title: & Found | 16
item.description:
Season Finale: Part Two! 

After returning home to find that Couch has left, Melon must track down her best friend before it’s too late and he’s lost forever. (with special guests: Jessie Mueller, Chris Mann & Zach Reino)


Please support us by supporting our sponsors!

item.title: Lost | 15
item.description:
Season Finale: Part One! 

Melon and Couch get into a fight and Melon storms out of the house, vowing to never come home again. After realizing he made a mistake, Couch comes up with a plan to journey out into the world and find his best friend. (with special guest: Zach Reino)


Please support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Smart House | 14
item.description:
When Luke and Chloe upgrade the house to be a Smart House, Soulless Computer begins to take control of everyone and everything. As more and more of the house fall under Soulless Computer’s spell, Melon teams up with Bookshelf to take down the system and save her friends. (with special guest: Rory O’Malley)


Please support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Doctor Madam Mayor | 13
item.description:
Everyone knows that Goldy, the golden retriever, is the mayor of the dog park. What everyone doesn’t know is that Goldy is retiring and tapping Melon to be the next mayor. A small dog has never been the mayor before, but the house helps her prepare to run a flawless campaign. (with special guest: Emma Hunton)


Please support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: One Small Step for Melon | 12
item.description:
Melon can’t help but feel like she is stuck in her routine and wants to go exploring with Couch. Next thing you know, they find a homemade spaceship in their neighbor’s backyard and they head off into space. But when their spaceship crash lands on the moon, Melon and Couch have to figure out how to get home. (with special guests: Cal Shapiro & Rodrick Covington)


Please support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: No Business In Show Business | 11
item.description:
When Melon feels ignored by Luke and Chloe, she decides to start a glamorous Hollywood career to get their attention. With Couch as her talent agent, she becomes the face of a trusted brand and lands a coveted audition to be Reckless Dan’s Dog Assistant. (with special guest: Aisha Jackson)


Please support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Melon Joins The Bad Girls Club | 10
item.description:
After a failed game of tug of war with Couch, Melon decides that she could use some dog friends and wonders if perhaps the Bad Girls Club could be a good option. The Bad Girls tell Melon that in order to be a part of their exclusive club, she’ll have to help them pull off a heist. And not just any heist…a salmon heist. (with special guests: Louis Price & Griffin Matthews)


Please support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Double Emergency | 9
item.description:
During the Annual House Triathlon, Melon and Couch get injured and hide it from Luke and Chloe for as long as they can. Eventually, Melon’s Eye and Couch’s Leg speak up and demand immediate medical attention. After a trip to the vet and a visit from a furniture fixer, Melon and Couch realize that it’s okay to ask for help. (with special guests: Danny Pudi & Jo Lampert)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Family Is All We Got | 8
item.description:
While waiting for Luke outside a coffee shop, Melon runs into her long lost brother, Scram, and they have a joyous reunion. After a big night on the town, Melon insists Scram come live with her, but integrating him into her home life proves to be difficult. (with special guests: Zach Reino & Joe Pizzulo)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Roof Dog! | 7
item.description:
Melon is having trouble figuring out how to be helpful...that is until she gets on the roof and transforms into her superhero alter-ego, Roof Dog! Along with her all-seeing sidekick, Chimney, she must stop the supervillain, Dumpster, from stealing all the toys in the neighborhood. It’s a stinky situation and it smells like a job for Roof Dog! (with special guests: Chris Mann & Rory O'Malley)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Who is Melon? | 6
item.description:
Unlike most of her friends in the house who have a tag and a very clear purpose, Melon realizes she doesn’t know where she comes from which sends her on a journey of self discovery. Along the way, she gets a dramatic haircut, finds out her breed, meets “Mirror Melon” and realizes that your past is only part of you, not all of you. (with special guest: Peter Russo)

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Best Friends for Never | 5
item.description:
When Couch and Couch Two unexpectedly become friends and bond over life as a couch, Melon feels left behind. Determined to find a new best friend, Melon tries to buddy up to a fish, an electronic dog treat dispenser and a lost dog poster only to find that you can’t force best friendship. (with special guest: Aisha Jackson)

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Melon in the Sky | 4
item.description:
Luke and Chloe go to visit Luke’s parents in Pittsburgh which means Melon gets to go on her first plane ride ever. Melon is seated in an exit row and called on by a group of extraordinary service dogs to assist when there’s a problem with the plane and she’s the only animal small enough to save the day. (with special guests: Mary Holland & Cal Shapiro)


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Nothing Goes as Planned | 3
item.description:
When Wall Calendar falls off the wall, Luke and Chloe forget it’s their anniversary and begin fighting. Melon and Couch decide they have to step in and save the relationship by throwing the best anniversary party ever. They consult old pictures of Luke and Chloe to plan the perfect party, but unfortunately, nothing goes as planned. Will their efforts be enough to restore harmony in the house? (with special guests: Tom Hennes & Hannah Whitney)

Please support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Magic Hour Walk | 2
item.description:
Couch dreams of taking a walk, and with the help of a spell book from Bookshelf, Melon just might be able to make his dream come true. After gathering some bizarre ingredients and learning some basic Latin, the two share a beautiful sunset walk but must make it back to the house before the spell wears off and Couch is stuck on the curb forever. (with special guest: Rory O'Malley)

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Something New for the House | 1
item.description:
Melon’s human parents, Luke and Chloe, announce that they’re heading out to get something new for the house. When they’re gone, the objects of the house speculate on what could it be? And then Wall Calendar privately informs Melon that Luke and Chloe have gone Couch shopping. Oh no - they’re replacing Couch! Melon can’t lose her best friend in the world! Now she must figure out a way to tell Couch the truth and lead the house in coming up with a plan to save him. (with special guests: Griffin Matthews & Rory O'Malley)

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.title: Introducing: Melon's House Party
item.description:
Welcome to Melon’s House Party! Did you know that the objects in your house sing and speak all day long? They just do so in a key only dogs can hear. Enter, Melon, an eight pound dog with a thousand pound heart who is the key to a world that lives right under our noses!  She lives in a world full of friends; an always singing record player, a soulless computer, her bookshelf therapist and many more. But her best friend in the world is Couch. No musical adventure is too big for Melon and Couch as long as they can figure out a way to do it together.   As Melon learns about herself and the world around her, she shows us how to appreciate the little things in life and the importance of friendship and family.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

item.itunes:summary:

She lives in a world full of friends; an always singing record player, a soulless computer, her bookshelf therapist and many more. But her best friend in the world is Couch. No musical adventure is too big for Melon and Couch as long as they can figure out a way to do it together. item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Melon’s House Party! Did you know that the objects in your house sing and speak all day long? They just do so in a key only dogs can hear. Enter, Melon, an eight pound dog with a thousand pound heart who is the key to a world that lives right under our noses!  She lives in a world full of friends; an always singing record player, a soulless computer, her bookshelf therapist and many more. But her best friend in the world is Couch. No musical adventure is too big for Melon and Couch as long as they can figure out a way to do it together.   As Melon learns about herself and the world around her, she shows us how to appreciate the little things in life and the importance of friendship and family.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
